string.name: reason
string.value: These may include lock screen notifications, banners, badges, sounds, and vibrations. You can change this in Settings.

string.name: reason_simple
string.value: These may include banners, badges, and sounds. You can change this in Settings.

string.name: reason_zyt
string.value: These may include lock screen and banner notifications as well as sounds and vibration. You can modify these settings in EasyAbroad > App management.

string.name: reason_tv
string.value: Notification reminder methods include banner. You can change your preferences in Settings.
